headline: Do Analyst Upgrades Signal a Stronger Backlog-Driven Earnings Story for Quanta Services (PWR)?
summary: Earlier this week, analysts at Jefferies and J.P. Morgan reaffirmed and upgraded their positive views on Quanta Services, highlighting the company’s multibillion-dollar project backlog and expectations for higher revenue and earnings. The combination of a roughly US$39.17 billion backlog and a strong multi-year earnings growth record has reinforced confidence that Quanta’s existing contracts may underpin its future operating performance. With this backdrop of a rapidly expanding backlog,...
